comments: He has a great sense of humor and he is open to the classes suggestion and will change testsdue dates upon request. I had a long class but i enjoyed being it due to his style. Highly reccommend

I had him for 2 hours and 40 mins his power points and lectures were irrevelent to his exams. It made no sense to take notes in his class if they were useless to his exam. He knows his stuff but sucks at testing ur knowledge. ps must read textbook and memorized it

Jackson is very real and honest. Easy to get along with. Tests online - some difficult questions. Alot of interesting discussions. Talk in class, he\'ll respond. Overall, a great teacher and he\'s easy to relate to. Take his class.
